name: virulent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A virulent disease or poison is dangerous and spreads or affects people very quickly: A particularly virulent strain of flu has recently claimed a number of lives in the region.
formal full of hate and violent opposition: She is a virulent critic of US energy policy.
